title: Love Island villa erupts with excitement as Adam Farrugia receives a surprise delivery
text:
It's barely been 24 hours since one Love Islander was kicked out of the villa.

But the drama is set to continue on Friday's episode when Adam Farrugia is treated to a surprise delivery.

In a sneak peek clip, the 27-year-old plasterer is relaxing by the pool with Josh Packham, one half of the twin intruders, when his phone goes off.

'I've got a text!' the pair shout excitedly as they summon the rest of the islanders.

Londoner Cassie doesn't appear too pleased about the commotion, saying: 'It was so calm!'

But as the group of hunky singletons gather around, Adam reads it out loud.

What's behind the door? As the group of hunky singletons gathered around, Adam Farrugia (pictured) read out his text

He says: 'Adam, there is a delivery for all islanders waiting at the front door. Please go and collect it.'

Intrigued as to what the surprise could be, the islanders then head over to the hot pink door to find out.

But teasingly, the clip ends just before the delivery is revealed, leaving fans desperate to find out what it is.

New couple alert! Luke Packham coupled up with Cassie Lansdell (pictured with Sophie Monk)

But from the reaction of the excited lovebirds, it's certainly something good.

Thursday's episode saw the islanders face a shock elimination.

The twins, Josh and Luke Packham, got the chance to vote first, choosing Anna McVey and Cassie Lansdell respectively.

Their decision left both Phoebe Thompson and Anna's partner Gerard Majda at risk of elimination after the recoupling ceremony.

Following a cast vote, Phoebe was sent home.

Love Island Australia continues Friday at 8.30pm on Channel Nine
description: It's barely been 24 hours since one Love Islander was kicked out of the villa.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
